files.name: README.md
files.content: ## About Colorbox: A customizable lightbox plugin for jQuery. See the [project page](http://jacklmoore.com/colorbox/) for documentation and a demonstration, and the [FAQ](http://jacklmoore.com/colorbox/faq/) for solutions and examples to common issues. Released under the [MIT license](http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php). ## Changelog: ##### Version 1.6.4 - 2016/05/10 * Fixed bug where using the inline property would duplicate target elements, if the selector matched multiple elements. ##### Version 1.6.3 - 2015/07/27 * Fixed regression that caused error in IE8 when the calculated initial size was negative. Fixes #741 ##### Version 1.6.2 - 2015/07/13 * Fixed iframe attribute name (allowFullScreen to allowFullscreen). Fixes #737 ##### Version 1.6.1 - 2015/05/14 * Replaced the inline onclick handler for cboxPhoto with a namespaced event for easier unbinding. Fixes #719. ##### Version 1.6.0 - 2015/03/03 * Added two new properties that expose how `` and `
